word:
Chap. 164 - To F. E. Belden

                            Norfolk Villa, Prospect St., Granville, N.S.W. 
                                                       June 8, 1895. 

Mr. Frank Belden, 
     Chicago, Ill. 
        4331 Indiana Ave. 
                                                           B-15-1895 

Dear Nephew:-- 
     I received your letter, also the favor of your music book, and songs in leaflets, from the hand of Ella May White, and I thank you for them. As soon as the Vancouver mail closes, I shall be pleased to examine your song book.
